new.name: 20 Years of Paul Smith and Maharam
new.description: Over two decades of close collaboration, Paul Smith and Maharam have translated the British designer's signature flair for idiosyncratic combinations of pattern and color to more than forty textiles, wallcoverings, and accessories. Illustrations by Andy Rementer and photography by Nick Ballon capture the stories and characteristic playfulness behind twenty designs. Softcover. 96 pages.
